product.title: The Sneetches and Other Stories | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
In The Sneetches and Other Stories, Dr. Seuss delivers four irresistible tales that offer everyday lessons in his extraordinary style of prose. First in “The Sneetches,” the star-bellied Sneetches think they are better than all others until a trickster named McBean comes along. Next in “The Zax,” children learn the pitfalls of getting stuck in one’s tracks. The third story, “Too Many Daves,” reveals that individuality is a good thing. And finally in “What Was I Scared Of?,” the fear that one feels in the dark turns out to be nothing but a lark. With Dr. Seuss’s The Sneetches and Other Stories, you get four times the wisdom and four times the fun, all wrapped up in one!

Tie-in Activity: Have a Sneetch snack. Use a cookie cutter to cut your child’s favorite sandwich (or other similar food) into the shape of a star.
